# RAPIDSAI: GPU-accelerated end-to-end data processing 
![](https://storage.googleapis.com/gcf-sources-765144203246-us-central1/Screenshot%202020-08-26%20at%2010.47.15%20AM.png)


**What is RAPIDSAI?**

RAPIDSAI is a suite of Python open source libraries for end-to-end data science which run entirely on GPU. RAPIDSAI has been built on top of Apache Arrow and GoAI and it is based on columnar in-memory data structure. 

**The main packages included into RAPIDSAI are:**

* cupy - GPU version of numpy Python for arrays
* cuDF - GPU version of Python pandas
* cuML - GPU version of Scikit-learn package for machine learning
* BlazingSQL - GPU accelerated SQL engine
* cuGRAPH - GPU accelerated graph analysis

**RAPIDSAI BlazingSQL is 100x faster than Apache Spark**
[Reference](https://blog.blazingdb.com/blazingsql-100x-faster-than-apache-spark-on-google-colab-17a97642605)
